transfer learning one is feature
extraction so what this does is that you
use the base model the pre-train model
as is so you just REM you just replace
the last classification layer so you
remove a classif classification layer
from the pre- chain model the rest of
the model is is treated as a feature

classification layer so that new
classification layer um you will train
that um that classification layer for
your particular task so so this U
classification layer is um referred to
as Top Model or classification head um
so you use the the base model to extract
features and then you use those features
as input into your classification head
or your Top Model um to uh to apply it
to your particular task on your
particular uh data okay the other
approach is fine-tuning so you do this
you also do the same thing but then you
can also tune some of the weights in the

pixels versus white pixels and things

model um you get more and more um

layer and feed to a separate classifier

if the new data set is large and similar

fine-tune the top layers or all layers
